name: Burg_472
culture_notes: speaks a Coastal Tongues dialect with Riveric loanwords
regular sea-blessing rituals and tide festivals
diet centered on salted fish, seaweed, and preserved goods
stilted/raised wooden architecture to resist floods
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
notes: population unknown; functions chiefly as a maritime waypoint
strategic for small-ship coastal routes between islands
